sender: {% for response in responses %}"{% if response.message.contact %}{{ response.message.contact }}{% else %}{{ response.message.connection.identity }}{% endif %}"
value: {% ifequal response.poll.type t" %}{{ response.eav.poll_text_value }}{% else %}{% ifequal response.poll.type "n" %}{{ response.eav.poll_number_value }}{% else %}{% ifequal response.poll.type 'l' %}{{ response.eav.poll_location_value.name }}{% endifequal %}{% endifequal %}{% endifequal %}"
categories: {% if response.categories %}{% for responsecategory in response.categories.all %}{{ responsecategory.category.name }},{% endfor %}{% endif %}
